artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; head and shoulders of a woman applying pigment to her lips with her finger, holding a blue and white container of pigment; red and white kimono with grey and white collar
inscription: 大正十一年十月 {Taishō jūichinen jūgatsu} (October 1922)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 伊東 {Ito_} | LBC, red publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin} | on back, red seal 貮百枚限り絶版　第七十二番 {nihyaku mai kagiri zeppan, dai nanajūni ban} (limited edition of 200, number 72)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Forms of New Beauties (Shin bijin jūni sugata 新美人十二姿)
title: Lip Rouge
